Something went wrong, and Prepare Carefully was not able to recover. The following error message may help identify the problem:"{0}"
LanguageData.knownFactionsRecommendation: Faction Discovery: It is recommended to start with very few known factions. The lower the faction cap, the less likely you discover new factions.
LanguageData.ScenPart_KnownFactions: You know {0} friendly and {1} hostile factions at the beginning.
LanguageData.discoverAtStartText: You know of {0} other factions in the region. Over time you will discover more.
LanguageData.discoverAtDropText: As you drop onto the planet you are able to see {0} large settlements in the region. Over time you will discover more.
LanguageData.discoveredGood: You have spotted a new faction!They are {0} and call themselves {1}.They are not hostile.
LanguageData.discoveredBad: You have spotted a new faction!They are {0} and call themselves {1}.They are hostile towards you.
LanguageData.MinStockLabel: If less than X, resume operation.
LanguageData.BillGainsName: The name of the bill is {0}.
LanguageData.ShiftLabel: Shift-Click : Increase or decrease by 5x.Ctrl-Click : Increase or decrease by 10x.Alt-Click : Increase or decrease min stock count
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.PrioritiesWorkgiversTip: Currently showing simple (vanilla) priorities.Click to switch to detailed priorities
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.PrioritiesWorktypesTip: Currently showing detailed priorities.Click to switch to vanilla priorities
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.PrioritiesToggleTip: Currently showing numeric priorities.Click to switch to on/off priorities
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.PrioritiesIntTip: Currently showing on/off priorities.Click to switch to numeric priorities
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.PrioritiesSchedulerTip: Currently showing scheduled priorities.Click to switch to all-day priorities
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.PrioritiesAllDayTip: Currently showing all-day priorities.Click to switch to scheduled priorities
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.Name: Name
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.NameColumnTip: Click to sort by name.Right click to sort by game order.
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.WorkPrioritiesDisclaimer: The default work priorities window allows you to change default priorities of work types (cooking, constructing, etc.), and the activities within them (carry materials, build, etc.).\nDISCLAIMER:\nIt is entirely possible to bring your colony to a grinding halt by carelessly changing priorities. Use the button on the top right of this dialog to return to the vanilla default priorities.
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.CurrentJobColumnTip: Current activity.Click to sort by activity
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.CurrentMoodColumnTip: Current mood.Click to sort by mood
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.CreateFavouritesDialog: Create a new favourite from the current work settings of {0}.
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.ClickToAssignOrCreateFavourit: Click to assign or create new favourite
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.ColorCodedPassionsTip: Should passion icons be colour coded?
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.24HourModeTip: Should times be shown in 12h (noon/9p.m.) or 24h (12:00, 21:00) mode?
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.MaxPriorityTip: How many levels of priority should we use? (Limited to between 4 and 9)
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.WorktypeHeaderTip: {0}Click to sort by skill.\nShift-left-click to {1} for all.\nShift-right-click to {2} for all{3}
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.WorkgiverHeaderTip: {0}Click to sort by skill.\nShift-left-click to {1} for all.\nShift-right-click to {2} for all{0} is a {3} job{4}
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.SchedulerHourTip:
{0} - {1} is currently {2}.
Left-click to add to selection.
Right-click to remove from selection.
Shift left-click to select only this hour.
LanguageData.Fluffy.Blueprints.NothingAvailableInBlue: None of the items in {0} can be build with the current technology.
LanguageData.Fluffy.Blueprints.XNotAvailableInBluepri: Some of the items in {0} can not be build with the current technology: {1}
LanguageData.QualityBuilderCommand.Label: QualityBuild
LanguageData.QualityBuilderOn.Label: QualityBuilder set
LanguageData.QualityBuilderOff.Label: QualityBuilder remove
LanguageData.SendAwayQuestion: Are you sure you want to send the visitors from {0} away?
LanguageData.Button_Restore_Tooltip: 从选择的编号位置恢复MODS列表。Restore the mod list from the selected slot.
LanguageData.Button_Backup_Tooltip: 将MODS列表备份到选择的空位。Backup the current mod list into the selected slot.
LanguageData.Button_Import_Tooltip: 从一个存档中载入MODS列表。
LanguageData.Button_State_Select_Tooltip: 选择一个空位来备份或者恢复MODS列表。* means the slot has not been set.
LanguageData.Dialog_Import_Desc: 选择一个存档来载入MODS列表，本操作将直接载入存档所用MODS列表，覆盖当前已选择的内容。载入后，你可以将新列表备份到一个空位。
LanguageData.Settings_Steam_Sync_Desc: Sync your mod save states to Steams cloud. It is recommended to close Rimworld and allow Steam to sync after changing this setting.
LanguageData.Settings_State_Names_Desc: You can name each save state here.* means the slot has not been set.
LanguageData.Settings_State_Revert_Desc: This will restore the mods backup that is created everytime RimWorld starts. Use this if something goes wrong and you lose your mod order.\nNOTE:You must restart RimWorld for the new mods list to take effect.
